long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is part of the Capisce Advyza system. Do not install it, unless asked by your organisation. Typically, it is installed by your IT department. The purpose of the extension is to allow the Advyza Desktop Client to determine the web application opened by the user. The Client may show an Advyza Notification in a separate window or an Advyza Block message in the browser window. For the description of the Advyza system see: https://www.advyza.com/
